price: "Lalle ne, Nĩ ne Ubangijnka, sai ka ɗẽbe takalmanka* Lalle ne kanã a rãfin nan abin tsarkakẽwa, ¦uwa."
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى
footnotes: * An ce wa Mũsã ya ɗebe takalmansa dõmin sunã da najasa kõ kuwa sũ kansu najasa ne dõmin ya shiga wuri mai tsarki wanda ake kira Ɗuwa a cikin sahãrar Sina'i a tsakãnin Masar da Madyana.".

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innī anā rabbuka fa-ikh'laʿ naʿlayka innaka bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
